import React from 'react' import {StyledMovieInfo} from '../styles/StyledMovieInfo' import {IMAGE_BASE_URL,POSTER_SIZE} from '../../config' import NoImage from '../images/no_image.jpg' import MovieThumb from './MovieThumb' const MovieInfo=({backdrop,img,movieId,title,plot})=>( {console.log(`${IMAGE_BASE_URL}${POSTER_SIZE}${img}`)}

) export default MovieInfo;
